import React from "react"; import '@fortawesome/free-regular-svg-icons' import { FontAwesomeIcon } from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome'; import { faReact, faDocker, faPython } from '@fortawesome/free-brands-svg-icons'; import Chip from '@mui/material/Chip'; import '../assets/styles/Expertise.scss'; const labelsFirst = [ "ASP.NET Core", "Entity Framework Core", "DevExpress", ".NET", "xUnit", "NUnit", "OAuth2", "Hangfire", "Rabbit", "Swagger", "Postman" ]; const labelsSecond = [ "MySQL", "T-SQL", "EF Core", "ADO.NET", "SSMS", "Profiler" ]; const labelsThird = [ "Azure", "Groq", "LangChain", "Qdrant", "Hugging Face", "LlamaIndex", "Streamlit", ]; function Expertise() { return (

Expertise

Backend .Net Development

I have built a diverse array of web applications from scratch using modern technologies such as ASP.NET Core and C#. I have strong proficiency in backend development and a solid understanding of the software development lifecycle.

Tech stack: {labelsFirst.map((label, index) => ( ))}

MySQL Database Development

I have designed and optimized complex relational databases and integrated them seamlessly with web and desktop applications. I have strong proficiency in SQL development, including writing stored procedures, views, and functions, as well as ensuring performance and data integrity across the system. I am experienced with technologies such as Microsoft SQL Server, T-SQL, Entity Framework, ADO.NET, and database-first or code-first approaches in .NET environments.

Tech stack: {labelsSecond.map((label, index) => ( ))}

Azure Deploying

I have hands-on experience deploying and managing backend services and full-stack applications in the Microsoft Azure cloud. I have worked with Azure App Service for web application hosting, Azure SQL Database for relational data storage, and Azure Storage for file and blob management. I am also familiar with setting up CI/CD pipelines using Azure DevOps and GitHub Actions, as well as configuring authentication and access control via Azure Active Directory. My workflow includes monitoring and scaling applications using Azure Monitor and Application Insights to ensure high availability and performance.

Tech stack: {labelsThird.map((label, index) => ( ))}
); } export default Expertise;
